author: Mark Kaufman
title: Reporter who fled bison gets an official national park safety poster
description: On March 25, NBC reporter Deion Broxton made the wise decision to avoid a herd of bison. Broxton's judgment to hastily pack up his camera, which was still recording, went viral. (The good kind of viral Not this kind.) "Oh no, I'm not messing with you," Broxto…
content:
On March 25, NBC reporter Deion Broxton made the wise decision to avoid a herd of bison.
Broxton's judgment to hastily pack up his camera, which was still recording, went viral. (The good kind of viral. Not this kind.)
"Oh no, I'm not messing with you," Bro… [+1410 chars]
